content:
ICS 269, Spring 1999: Theory Seminar

The theory group meets Fridays at 1:00 in the CS 432/438 conference room.

This quarter's schedule:

9 Apr:   Organizational Meeting
16 Apr:   (Cancelled due to faculty retreat)
23 Apr:   (Cancelled)
30 Apr: Ziemowit Laski Ordered Context Free Grammars
7 May:    
14 May David Hart  
21 May: David Goggin Presentation of "Label Placement by Maximum Independent Set in Rectangles," by Pankaj K. Agarwal, Marc Van Kreveld, and Subhash Suri. Abstract.
28 May:    
4 Jun: Dan Hirschberg  
11 Jun:    

Other quarters' theory seminars

George Lueker, Theory Group, Dept. Information & Computer Science, UC Irvine.
Last update: 6 Mar 2000
